title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High - Cameron Crowe

Cameron Crowe spent a year with them at Ridgemont High in Anytown, California, and if you canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t imagine or canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t remember (last week? last year? last decade?) what itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s like to have acne, bio lab, Saturday night car cruises, and the embarrassment of parents, Fast Times at Ridgemont High will bring it all home for you.
